term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - nucleation in colloid chemistry
term.title: nucleation

item.text: The process by which nuclei are formed in solution. The condensation of a single chemical compound is called homogeneous nucleation. The simultaneous condensation of more than one compound is called simultaneous nucleation. The condensation of a compound on a foreign substance is called heterogeneous nucleation.
